This story shapes how we expect love to be—flawless and magical. It sets up warped expectations we’re shocked to see fall apart, leading to heartbreak. But hey, at least some of us have learned that love isn't about finding The One but showing up for each other through it all. Welcome to the adult world of messy, messy love.

question: How much responsibility do individuals bear for climate change versus governments and corporations? Does personal action matter at all given the scale of the problem?
